document.full_text: two former city child welfare workers were criminally charged in the death of a 4-year-old girl under their supervision, the first such prosecution in new york, officials said on wednesday.
document.title: new york charges child welfare workers in landmark case
lines_and_colors: two former city child welfare workers were criminally charged in the death of a 4-year-old girl under their supervision, the first such prosecution in new york, officials said on wednesday.
